info.title: Valio Aimo Customer Portal API
info.description: Backend API for Zero-Fail Logistics Customer Portal

post.description: Login endpoint for both admin and customers

get.description: Get current authenticated user information
Get customer's cart

Browse products with pagination and filters

- **skip**: Number of items to skip (for pagination)
- **limit**: Maximum number of items to return (default: 20)
- **category**: Filter by category name
- **sub_category**: Filter by subcategory name
- **search**: Search in product names, codes, and GTIN
- **temperature_zone**: Filter by temperature zone (frozen, chilled, ambient)

Get all product categories with their subcategories

Returns a list of categories, each containing:
- category: The main category name
- sub_categories: List of subcategory names under this category

schema.title: Response Get Categories Customer Products Categories Get

get.description: Get product details

post.description:
Assess risk for multiple products using the risk prediction API

Returns shortage_probability (0-1) for each product

get.description: Get similar products using AI-based semantic search

schema.title: Response Get Similar Products Customer Products  Product Code  Similar Get
